portfolio.stock.model

Class UserPortfoliosImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • portfolio.stock.model.UserPortfoliosImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    UserPortfolios

    public class UserPortfoliosImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements UserPortfolios
    Represents the implementation of the model of the stock MVC application. Maintains a list of portfolios. All the dates used are in 24hour format. The portfolio name is not case sensitive.

      • createPortfolio

        public void createPortfolio(java.lang.String name)
        Description copied from interface: UserPortfolios
        Used to create a portfolio with the specified name. Names have to be unique, no two portfolio can have the same name. Names are case insensitive.
        Specified by:
        createPortfolio in interface UserPortfolios
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the portfolio to be created.

      • buyStocks

        public void buyStocks(java.lang.String pName,
                      java.lang.String ticker,
                      double price,
                      java.lang.String date,
                      StockData data)
        Description copied from interface: UserPortfolios
        Used to get the stock to be bought and add it to the specified portfolio.
        Specified by:
        buyStocks in interface UserPortfolios
        Parameters:
        pName - represents the portfolio to which stock is to be added.
        ticker - the label of the stock to be added.
        price - the price of the stock to be added.
        date - th date at which the stock was bought.
        data - the data object from which the stock data is to be got.
